summary: This module implements an OpenAIâ€‘compatible handler for Together AI's `/v1/completions` endpoint. It defines a class that translates standard OpenAI completion parameters into Together AI requests, invokes the model, and formats the response using litellm utilities.
business_intent: Allow applications built on litellm to access Together AI language models through a familiar OpenAI completion interface, simplifying integration and expanding model options for text generation tasks.
